comment.text: The translation key "StandardDecryptionAlgorithm" is used to display the default decryption algorithm name as a label in the Single Sign-On certificate settings page. It appears in a dropdown list and is typically used by users to select or review the encryption method. This term should be translated accordingly to provide consistency across different languages.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Şifrə Açma Alqoritmi' translates to 'Decryption Algorithm', 'Default' isn't directly equivalent to a descriptive phrase in this context. A better translation might consider a more concise or idiomatic expression.

The translation 'Стандартно зададен алгоритъм за декриптиране' is too literal and verbose for 'Default Decrypt Algorithm'. It implies a 'set' algorithm, which isn't necessarily the intention. A more natural translation would convey the meaning of a default option.
The translation uses a complex phrase that may be difficult for users to understand quickly.  A shorter, more concise option is preferred for technical documentation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Алгоритъм по подразбиране' to improve readability.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation "Վերծանել լռելյայն ալգորիթմը" is a literal translation of 'Decrypt Default Algorithm'.  'Default' is better conveyed as 'կանոնավոր' (kanonavor) or 'կարգավորված' (kargavorvac) meaning 'standard' or 'regulated'.  'Լռելյայն' (lreljain) is overly formal and could be replaced with a more common word for 'default'.

The Lao translation 'ສູດການຖອດລະຫັດເລີ່ມຕົ້ນ' while literally translating to 'Initial Decryption Algorithm,' doesn't convey the meaning of 'Default Decrypt Algorithm' accurately. 'Default' implies a standard or pre-configured option, which isn't explicitly captured.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'ວິທີການຖອດລະຫັດຕາມບົກຄຳນັ້ນ' (Vithi kan thot lahad tam bok kam nan) which translates to 'Decryption method as instructed/specified' or 'ວິທີການຖອດລະຫັດຕາມການກຳນົດ' (Vithi kan thot lahad tam kan kamnot) which translates to 'Decryption method as defined'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Standaard Ontcijferen Algoritme' doesn't perfectly capture the nuance of 'Default Decrypt Algorithm'. 'Ontcijferen' implies a process of decrypting, while 'Default' describes a pre-selected method. A better translation would reflect that it's the standard/default algorithm used.

While "Algoritm de decriptare implicit" is understandable, "Default Decrypt Algorithm" implies a default setting for the decryption process. "Algoritm de decriptare implicit" is a more literal translation of 'implicit' and doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'default'.

The English phrase "Default Decrypt Algorithm" is more accurately translated as "Алгоритм дешифрования по умолчанию" rather than "Стандартный алгоритм расшифровки:".  'Стандартный алгоритм расшифровки:' implies a standard decryption algorithm as a requirement, not as a default.

The translation "පෙරනිමි විසංකේතන ඇල්ගොරිතමය" while containing the correct terms, doesn't convey the meaning of "Default Decrypt Algorithm" effectively. 'පෙරනිමි' (peranimu) implies a custom or personal setting rather than a system default.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A better translation might be "පෙරනිමි ක්‍රියාවලිය" (peranimi kriyavaliya) which more closely aligns with 'Default Process' or "සමdefaultValue ක්‍රියාවලිය" (samadevalu kriyavaliya) conveying 'Standard/Default Process'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'Predvolený algoritmus dešifrovania' is a very literal translation and sounds somewhat clunky in Slovak. A more natural phrasing would be 'Štandardný dešifrovací algoritmus' or 'Štandardný dešifrovaný algoritmus'.

While "Подразумевани Алгоритам за декрипцију" is understandable, it's a somewhat literal and slightly awkward translation of "Default Decrypt Algorithm." A more natural and idiomatic Serbian translation would be "Стандардни Алгоритам за декрипцију" or "Уобичајени Алгоритам за декрипцију".

The translation 'Podrazumevani Algoritam za dekripciju' is a bit literal. While technically correct, 'Default Decrypt Algorithm' often translates better as 'Algoritam za dešifrovanje po defaultu' or 'Podrazumevani dešifrovani algoritam'. 'Dekripciju' is accurate, but 'dešifrovanje' is more commonly used in technical contexts.
While 'Varsayılan Şifre Çözme Algoritması' is technically correct, it's quite literal and a bit clunky. 'Şifre Çözme' is generally understood, but a more natural phrasing would improve readability.
